description: React component for chat message composition, including textarea input, action buttons (attach, search, study, voice), and drag-and-drop file upload. Handles user input, file selection, and UI interactions for a chat interface.

methods.name: Composer
methods.description: Main React functional component providing message input and quick action buttons.

parameters.onSend: Callback invoked with message text when user sends a message.
parameters.onAttach: Optional callback invoked with list of files when files are attached.

methods.name: handleKeyDown
methods.description: Handles keydown events in textarea, submitting on Enter key without Shift.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Sends the current message if not empty, then clears input.

methods.name: onFilesSelected
methods.description: Processes selected files, filtering by accepted formats, and invokes attachment callback.
